title: ERA Processing Controller
description:
Implement ERA File Upload and Payment Posting Controller

Create a comprehensive controller to handle Electronic Remittance Advice (ERA) file uploads, process the file contents, and post payment transactions to the appropriate patient accounts.

Requirements:
- Implement file upload endpoint that accepts ERA files in standard formats (835 EDI, CSV, or other specified formats)
- Validate uploaded file format and structure before processing
- Parse ERA file contents to extract payment information (claim numbers, payment amounts, adjustment codes, patient identifiers)
- Match ERA payment records to existing claims/invoices in the system
- Post payments to correct patient accounts with proper transaction categorization
- Handle adjustment codes and denials appropriately
- Create detailed audit trail of all payment postings
- Implement error handling for:
  - Invalid file formats
  - Unmatched claims/patients
  - Duplicate ERA submissions
  - Parsing failures
- Generate processing summary report showing successfully posted payments and any exceptions
- Support batch processing for ERAs containing multiple payment records
- Implement proper transaction rollback if processing fails mid-stream
- Add appropriate authorization/authentication checks for file upload access
- Log all processing activities for compliance and troubleshooting

Success Criteria:
- ERA files upload and process without manual intervention for standard cases
- All payments correctly posted to appropriate patient accounts
- Clear error messages for exceptions requiring manual review
- Complete audit trail maintained for all transactions
